menu1.name: California Congee
menu1.sub: A hearty rice porridge topped with Elote-spiced corn, caramelized mushrooms, fresh asparagus, and green onion.

menu1.name: Fennel on Sunflower Pesto Peas
menu1.sub: Caramelized Fennel atop a bed of peas tossed in a sunflower-seed pesto sauce. Served with a dollop of fennel pur√©e and fresh toasted sunflower seeds.

menu1.name: Cauliflower Cassoulet
menu1.sub: Oven Seared Cauliflower atop a comforting stew made of caramelized onion and white beans simmered in our rich vegetable broth. Served with arugula wilted in olive oil.
